 2019-07892019-06-16,  ESDC,  LAB,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActApprentice Loans Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Apprentice Loans Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the APPRENTICE LOANS REGULATIONS in order to make student and apprentice loans more affordable and accessible for students and apprentices who need them and particularly respond to the needs of vulnerable student and apprentice loan borrowers, including those facing challenging life or financial circumstances.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0215 Publication Date: 2019-06-26
